title: Summarize SERPBear data with AI (via Openrouter) and save it to Baserow
author: Keith Rumjahn
readme:
# Who's this for?

  * If you own a website and need to analyze your keyword rankings
  * If you need to create a keyword report on your rankings
  * If you want to grow your keyword positions



SerpBear is an opensourced SEO tool specifically for keyword analytics.

[Click here to read details of how I use it](https://rumjahn.com/how-to-create-an-a-i-agent-to-analyze-serpbear-keyword-rankings-using-n8n-for-free-without-any-coding-skills-required/)

![Screenshot 20241122 at 5.57.17 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_11_22_at_5_57_17_PM_291e6afa2b.png)

![Screenshot 20241122 at 5.54.58 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_11_22_at_5_54_58_PM_753d2c45a8.png)

Example output of A.I.
    
    
    **Key Observations about Ranking Performance:**
    
    - The top-performing keyword is “Openrouter N8N” with a current position of 7 and an improving trend.
    - Two keywords, “Best Docker Synology” and “Bitwarden Synology”, are not ranking in the top 100 and have a stable trend.
    - Three keywords, “Obsidian Second Brain”, “AI Generated Reference Letter”, and “Actual Budget Synology”, and “N8N Workflow Generator” are not ranking well and have a declining trend.
    
    **Keywords showing the most improvement:**
    
    - “Openrouter N8N” has an improving trend and a relatively high ranking of 7.
    
    **Keywords needing attention:**
    
    - “Obsidian Second Brain” has a declining trend and a low ranking of 69.
    - “AI Generated Reference Letter” has a declining trend and a low ranking of 84.
    - “Actual Budget Synology”, “N8N Workflow Generator”, “Best Docker Synology”, and “Bitwarden Synology” are not ranking in the top 100.
    
    

# Use case

Instead of hiring an SEO expert, I run this report weekly. It checks the keyword rankings of the past week and gives me recommendations on what to improve.

# How it works

The workflow gathers SerpBear analytics for the past 7 days.  
It passes the data to [openrouter.ai](http://openrouter.ai) for A.I. analysis.  
Finally it saves to baserow.

# How to use this

Input your SerpBearcredentials  
Enter your domain name  
Input your [Openrouter.ai](http://Openrouter.ai) credentials  
Input your baserow credentials  
You will need to create a baserow database with columns: Date, Note, Blog

Created by [Rumjahn](Rumjahn)
readme_html:
Who's this for?

  • If you own a website and need to analyze your keyword rankings
  • If you need to create a keyword report on your rankings
  • If you want to grow your keyword positions

SerpBear is an opensourced SEO tool specifically for keyword analytics.

Click here to read details of how I use it

Example output of A.I.

**Key Observations about Ranking Performance:**

- The top-performing keyword is “Openrouter N8N” with a current position of 7 and an improving trend.
- Two keywords, “Best Docker Synology” and “Bitwarden Synology”, are not ranking in the top 100 and have a stable trend.
- Three keywords, “Obsidian Second Brain”, “AI Generated Reference Letter”, and “Actual Budget Synology”, and “N8N Workflow Generator” are not ranking well and have a declining trend.

**Keywords showing the most improvement:**

- “Openrouter N8N” has an improving trend and a relatively high ranking of 7.

**Keywords needing attention:**

- “Obsidian Second Brain” has a declining trend and a low ranking of 69.
- “AI Generated Reference Letter” has a declining trend and a low ranking of 84.
- “Actual Budget Synology”, “N8N Workflow Generator”, “Best Docker Synology”, and “Bitwarden Synology” are not ranking in the top 100.

Use case

Instead of hiring an SEO expert, I run this report weekly. It checks the keyword rankings of the past week and gives me recommendations on what to improve.

How it works

The workflow gathers SerpBear analytics for the past 7 days.
It passes the data to openrouter.ai for A.I. analysis.
Finally it saves to baserow.

How to use this

Input your SerpBearcredentials
Enter your domain name
Input your Openrouter.ai credentials
Input your baserow credentials
You will need to create a baserow database with columns: Date, Note, Blog

Created by Rumjahn
readme_zh:
# 适用对象

  * 网站所有者，需分析关键词排名
  * 需要制作关键词排名报告
  * 希望提升关键词排名的用户

SerpBear是一款专为关键词分析设计的开源SEO工具。

[点击此处查看我的使用心得](https://rumjahn.com/how-to-create-an-a-i-agent-to-analyze-serpbear-keyword-rankings-using-n8n-for-free-without-any-coding-skills-required/)

![示例截图1](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_11_22_at_5_57_17_PM_291e6afa2b.png)

![示例截图2](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_11_22_at_5_54_58_PM_753d2c45a8.png)

人工智能分析报告示例：
    
**核心排名观察：**
- 表现最佳关键词为"Openrouter N8N"，当前排名第7位且呈上升趋势
- "Best Docker Synology"和"Bitwarden Synology"两个关键词未进入前100名且趋势稳定
- "Obsidian Second Brain"、"AI Generated Reference Letter"、"Actual Budget Synology"及"N8N Workflow Generator"四个关键词排名不佳且呈下降趋势

**显著进步关键词：**
- "Openrouter N8N"呈现上升趋势，排名第7位

**需重点关注关键词：**
- "Obsidian Second Brain"排名69位且趋势下滑
- "AI Generated Reference Letter"排名84位且趋势下滑
- "Actual Budget Synology"、"N8N Workflow Generator"、"Best Docker Synology"和"Bitwarden Synology"均未进入前100名

# 使用场景

我每周运行此报告替代雇佣SEO专家，通过检查过去一周的关键词排名获取优化建议。

# 工作原理

1. 采集SerpBear近7天分析数据
2. 将数据传送至[openrouter.ai](http://openrouter.ai)进行AI分析
3. 最终存储至baserow数据库

# 使用方法

1. 输入您的SerpBear凭证
2. 填写您的域名
3. 配置[Openrouter.ai](http://Openrouter.ai)凭证
4. 设置baserow凭证
5. 需在baserow创建包含Date/Note/Blog字段的数据库

开发者：[Rumjahn](Rumjahn)
title_zh: 利用AI（通过Openrouter）汇总SERPBear数据并保存至Baserow
